WorkItem.Description:
When you call CodeDomProvider.CompileAssemblyFromDom it can report compilation errors that are turned into an exception. The problem is that I cannot see the code that it couldn't compile. 
Â 
Please include a call to CodeDomProvider.GenerateCodeFromCompileUnit and pass that information along with the compilation errors to the TemplateCompilationException.
WorkItem.Summary: Needs better error reporting when there are compilation errors

Comments.Message: This is addressed in v3, we now include a much more verbose compilation output. This is currently enabled by setting `Debug` mode to on when using RazorEngine. Please visit https://github.com/Antaris/RazorEngine for updates, we're no longer pushing code changes here.
